description: In soft cotton jersey, this hooded T-shirt features a nautical-inspired print of sailboats, seagulls, and our beloved Polo Bear.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 33½" body length (front and back), a 22½" shoulder, a 56" chest, and a 37" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 35½" body length (front and back), a 22½" shoulder, a 56" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
